      • Ingredients

      For the Noodles

      • 1 cup all-purpose flour
      • 1/4 teaspoon salt
      • 1/4 cup water (or more if needed)

      For the Vegetable Curry

      • 1 tablespoon oil
      • 1 onion, chopped
      • 2 cloves garlic, minced
      • 1 inch ginger, grated
      • 1/2 cup green peas
      • 1/2 cup carrots, diced
      • 1/2 cup cauliflower florets
      • 1 can (15 ounces) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
      • 1 teaspoon garam masala
      • 1 teaspoon cumin powder
      • 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder
      • 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder (adjust to taste)
      • 1 can (14.5 ounces) coconut milk
      • Salt to taste
      Instructions

      Make the noodles

      Follow the instructions in my previous response for making homemade noodles.

      Prepare the curry

      Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and ginger, and cook until fragrant.

      Add vegetables

      Stir in the green peas, carrots, cauliflower, and chickpeas. Cook for a few minutes until slightly softened.

      Add spices

      Add the garam masala, cumin powder, turmeric powder, and red chili powder. Stir to combine.

      Add coconut milk

      Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Season with salt to taste.

      Cook noodles

      Cook the noodles according to package directions or until al dente.

      Combine

      Toss the cooked noodles with the vegetable curry.

      Serve

      Serve immediately.
